topic.shortdesc: List of the contents of a backup archive.

section.title: Description
section.p: Use the list command to list the contents of a backup archive.

section.title: Options
section.p:
The following are the command options:
remove options
Option Description
--dir /[directory name] Path of the backup archive. REQUIRED
--name [REPOSITORY-NAME] List only the contents in the specified backup repository.
--incr-backup [BACKUP-NUMBER] List only the contents in the specified incremental backup
--bucket-backup [BUCKET-NAME] List only the contents in the specified bucket backup

section.title: Examples
section.p: Run the list command to view the contents of the backup repository named travel:./backup list --dir /data/couchbase/backups --name travel

List the backups in the backup repository name travel from increment backup with the time stamp of 2016-01-22T15:42:41.383468246-08:00: ./backup list --dir /data/couchbase/backups --name travel \ --incr-backup 2016-01-22T15:42:41.383468246-08:00

List all respositories, backups and their contents in the Backup Archive in /data/couchbase/backups that are from the data bucket name travel-sample: ./backup list --dir /data/couchbase/backups --bucket-backup travel-sample
